title: Episode 256: An Insider's View of the Supply Chain
itunes:title: Episode 256: An Insider's View of the Supply Chain
description:
Goods appear to be randomly missing in stores, and prices seem to be rising. Much of what we're seeing is due to disruptions in the supply chain. This week, we talk with industry insider Mikhail Rasner about what's going on.


Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com
